sword.name: Crusader's Blade
sword.quote: Stalwart companion to the wandering warrior.
sword.description: A well balanced blade dealing moderate damage

sword.name: Bane Sword
sword.quote: Coated in the bile of a beast, long forgotten.
sword.description: Chance of poisoning enemies when attacking.

sword.name: Necromantic Sword
sword.description: When slaying a foe summon a ghost that will attack nearby enemies.

sword.name: Vampiric Sword
sword.quote: Vitality to those bold enough to take it.
sword.description: Chance to heal the wielder using the life force of a slain foe.

sword.name: Merciless Sword
sword.quote: Grant no mercy, take no chances.
sword.description: Chance to deal a Critical Hit when attacking enemies.

sword.name: Zealous Sword
sword.quote: The blade of the great Fanatic.
sword.description: Collected fervor will also increase the divine inspiration bar.

sword.name: Godly Sword
sword.quote: Once used to draw Godly blood...
sword.description: Deal significantly more damage than mortal weapons.

axes.name: Apostate's Cleaver
axes.quote: A mighty tool of unstoppable brutality.

axes.name: Bane Axe
axes.quote: Once struck by the toxins, one begs for the blade.
axes.description: Chance of poisoning enemies when attacking.

axes.name: Necromantic Axe
axes.description: When slaying a foe summon a ghost that will attack nearby enemies.

axes.name: Vampiric Axe
axes.quote: Consumer of the blood it spills

axes.name: Merciless Axe
axes.quote: Once borne by the executioners of old.
axes.description: Chance to deal a Critical Hit when attacking enemies.

axes.name: Zealous Axe
axes.quote: Used by the great Fanatic to execute heretics.
axes.description: Collected fervor will also increase the divine inspiration bar.

axes.name: Godly Axe
axes.quote: The blade that severed the Lands of the Old Faith from the world.
axes.description: Deal significantly more damage than mortal weapons.

dagger.name: Traitor's Razor
dagger.description: A fast blade signed for many cuts, low damage but lightning quick.

dagger.name: Bane Dagger
dagger.quote: Signature weapon of the jealous lover.

dagger.name: Vampiric Dagger

dagger.quote: Once borne by the executioners of old.

dagger.name: Zealous Dagger

gauntlets.name: Tempest's Gauntlets
gauntlets.quote: An iron fist from which none can escape.
gauntlets.description: A set of deadly spiked gloves. Weak at first, but devastating on a complete combo.

gauntlets.description: Chance of poisoning enemies when attacking.

gauntlets.name: Necromantic Gauntlets
gauntlets.quote: Once worn to gather the souls of the departed..
gauntlets.description: When slaying a foe summon a ghost that will attack nearby enemies.

gauntlets.name: Vampiric Gauntlets
gauntlets.quote: Made for drawing out the fire of life.

gauntlets.name: Zealous Gauntlets
